item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (123 points | 25 comments)
2. Ioccc Flight Simulator (2010) (67 points | 13 comments)
3. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (136 points | 16 comments)
4. Is It Better to Fail Spectacularly? (70 points | 56 comments)
5. Show HN: Erin – Open-source and self-hosted TikTok feed for your own videos (87 points | 33 comments)
6. Waking up science's sleeping beauties (2023) (9 points | 4 comments)
7. Plankton balloon to six times size in newly discovered mode of oceanic travel (20 points | 1 comment)
8. Intelsat 33e breaks up in geostationary orbit (108 points | 76 comments)
9. Can SpaceX land a rocket with 1/2 cm accuracy? (11 points | 5 comments)
10. A step toward fully 3D-printed active electronics (151 points | 65 comments)
11. Show HN: HN Update – Hourly news broadcast of top HN stories (511 points | 160 comments)
12. Making Castro’s Feeds Update Faster the Lazy Way (67 points | 17 comments)
13. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring FS Engineer (React/Mongo/Node) ( | hide)
14. Turning the Crank: Design as a Mechanical Process (7 points | discuss)

18. Kurt Vonnegut's lost board game published (286 points | 78 comments)
19. Drasi: Microsoft's open source data processing platform for event-driven systems (291 points | 51 comments)
20. Brain endurance training improves older adults' cognitive, physical performance (4 points | discuss)
21. Mosaic REALMAP: Explore Prague in detail with 1.26M images (150 points | 33 comments)
22. Sampling with SQL (154 points | 33 comments)
23. My free book "Rust Projects – Write a Redis Clone" is out (41 points | 16 comments)
24. C-Motive's electrostatic motors use printed circuit boards instead of magnets (107 points | 45 comments)
25. The Ultimate Conditional Syntax (125 points | 36 comments)
26. MVCC – the part of PostgreSQL we hate the most (2023) (340 points | 109 comments)
27. The AI Investment Boom (245 points | 334 comments)
28. Microsoft said it lost weeks of security logs for its customers' cloud products (246 points | 129 comments)
29. The history of the barcode (77 points | 23 comments)
30. The Secret History of Mongols: A Digital History Approach (18 points | 4 comments)
